title: 27 Heartwarming Memes That Celebrate Cat Companionship to Light a Feisty Fire in Your Feline-Loving Heart
description: Happy Thursday, feline fam! Is there anything greater than the power of love? The answer, surprisingly, is yes - and there is one power that trumps all forces in the universe. It's unstoppable. It's immovable. It's purrfect in every way, shape, and form. That power is your love for cats. You would do anything for your fur baby, right? Well, that right there is the gold that we're talking about. We love that you love your cats that much, and we can relate because we love our felines more than life itself.That's why we went through all the trouble of collecting these heartwarming memes for you - to celebrate your purrfectly purrfect relationship with your cute cat. We have a sneaking suspicion that your heart, after producing so much love for cats, has adopted an awwdorable cat shape (don't worry, it's purrfeclty normal). These wholesome feline funnies are sure to light a feisty fire in your hooman heart cage, so pick up your nearest cat and give them a big kiss for us. Have a great day!
author: Blake Seidel
excerpt: 27 Heartwarming Memes That Celebrate Cat Companionship to Light a Feisty Fire in Your Feline-Loving Heart - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals
text: That's what they always say, “We'll just keep him for a few days," and then he ends up staying for the next 10-15 years. It's a lie we all tell ourselves, a beautiful lie, but still a lie. This just goes to show that it's okay to lie sometimes. This exact lie is how we went from two cats to four cats, and we couldn't be happier! What are cats for if not for annoying them in our spare time? It's what they do to us. If they are allowed to wake us up in the middle of the night with their zoomies, then we're allowed to snuggle them when we're awake. Even if they don't want to.
html:
That's what they always say, “We'll just keep him for a few days," and then he ends up staying for the next 10-15 years. It's a lie we all tell ourselves, a beautiful lie, but still a lie. This just goes to show that it's okay to lie sometimes. This exact lie is how we went from two cats to four cats, and we couldn't be happier!

What are cats for if not for annoying them in our spare time? It's what they do to us. If they are allowed to wake us up in the middle of the night with their zoomies, then we're allowed to snuggle them when we're awake. Even if they don't want to.
